# UI Property
<!--
@name: UI Property
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
Returns the value of a UI component property.
## Parameters

- **id&dollar;**: The unique identifier of an existing UI component
- **propertyName&dollar;**: The name of a UI Component property
---
